channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Michael Saylor’s Strategy flirts again with the danger threshold at which his company is worth less than his Bitcoin
item.description: Why hold a stock that is worth less than the underlying asset it represents?

item.title: Michigan college survey says ‘6-7’ is lowkey cooked, put in on the ‘Banished Words List’
item.description: The Lake Superior State University roundup of overused slang started in 1976 as a New Year’s Eve party idea.

item.title: Betty Boop and Blondie join Mickey Mouse and Winnie the Pooh in the public domain
item.description: “It’s a big year,” said Jennifer Jenkins of Duke’s Center for the Study of the Public Domain. “It's just the sheer familiarity of all this culture.”

item.title: Amazon Will ‘Continue Supporting Throne And Liberty And Lost Ark’
item.description: Despite the bad news about New World, Amazon plans to "continue supporting" both Lost Ark and Throne and Liberty with updates.

item.title: Scientists Give Robots Skin With Pain Sensations And Human-Like Reflexes
item.description: Robot skin that senses touch and pain — and triggers instant reflexes — makes robots more like humans. It probably also makes the safer to be around ....

item.title: Widening K-shaped economy pattern across income groups
item.description: Bank of America data reveals a stark K-shaped economy as higher-income Americans spend 2.6% more while lower-income households manage just 0.6% growth...

item.title: Instagram CEO Says AI Slop Is So Prevalent It Will Be Easier To Track Real Content
item.description: Adam Mosseri leads Instagram as the CEO (although he seems to prefer the phrase Head of Instagram) and recently admitted that AI slop is all over our ...

item.title: Tesla is officially smaller than China’s BYD in EV sales as it reports second-straight year of falling sales
item.description: Tesla stock is down over 6% over the last five days but the market seemed to be expecting Friday's news about EV deliveries.

item.title: Bill Ackman slams California wealth tax as ‘expropriation’ of private property

item.title: Runaway boulder on Indiana Jones set rolls over Disney World worker
item.description: “We’re focused on supporting our cast member, who is recovering," Disney said in a statement.

item.title: Americans surge toward financial resolutions for 2026 amid household budget concerns
item.description: More Americans are planning financial resolutions for 2026, with 64% focusing on short-term savings goals amid inflation concerns, up from 56% last ye...

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
